page.title: 04Daily life in Sparkwell.
page.content: On Sunday 2nd June 1985 I got up at quarter past ten. Then I had my break- fast. I went to church because I am in the church choir. At twelve o'clock we came out of church and went home. I did some cooking.Then I had my dinner. At half past two my Mum,Dad,Grandma and myself went out for the afternoon. We went to Widecombe on the Moor.We looked round,in the shops and brought little things. Then we went back to the car park and had an icecream each. Then we went across Dartmoor and saw horses, foals, cows and calves. Then we went to Badgers Holt. At Dartmeet we looked at some birds and walked by the river. Then we went home. Sarah Masey.
